Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Flexor carpi radialis Medial epicondyle Base of 2nd Metacarpal
(Sometimes base of 3rd Met)		 Median n.
C6 - C7		 Wrist: Flexion, Radial deviation
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Medial epicondyle of Humerus @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} - Base of 2nd metacarpal @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Anatomical variations include base of 3rd metacarpal @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Median N.]({{< var ref-median-nerve.path >}}) ([C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}}), [C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **Wrist**: Flexion, Radial deviation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Can assist with elbow flexion and forearm pronation (biomech) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
